mapper.select:
select from public.cn_stock_daily
order by trade_date desc LIMIT 1

insert.foreach: insert into public.cn_stock_info (status, symbol, name, industry, market, exchange, list_date, create_date) values (#{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.market,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.listDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ON CONFLICT(symbol) DO UPDATE SET status = #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into public.cn_stock_daily (symbol, name, close_price, open_price, low_price, high_price, pre_close, change, pct_chg, vol, amount, profit, trade_date) values (#{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.closePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.openPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.lowPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.highPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.preClose,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.change,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.pctChg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.vol,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.profit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ON CONFLICT(symbol,trade_date) DO NOTHING

insert into public.cn_stock_ipo (symbol, name, ipo_date, issue_date, amount, market_amount, price, pe, limit_amount, funds, ballot ) values (#{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ipoDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.issueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.marketAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.pe,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.limitAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.funds,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.ballot,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ON CONFLICT(symbol) DO NOTHING

insert into public.cn_market_daily (listing, delisting, up, down, vol, amount, profit, shibor, libor, hibor, trade_date) values (#{item.listing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.delisting,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.up,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.down,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vol,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.profit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.shibor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.libor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.hibor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ON CONFLICT(trade_date) DO NOTHING

insert into public.cn_stock_daily_stat (symbol, price, sma_price, ma_price, ema_price, wma_price, trade_date) values (#{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.smaPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.maPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.emaPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.wmaPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ON CONFLICT(symbol, trade_date) DO NOTHING

mapper.insert: insert into public.data_delta_date (name, data_date) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ON CONFLICT(name) DO UPDATE SET data_date = #{dataDate,jdbcType=DATE}
